mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_CATEGORY,P_NAME,P_PRICE,P_END_DATE,P_OK,P_SEND_CONFIRM,P_CURRENTAMOUNT) VALUES (#{userId},(select count(*) from project where EMAIL = #{userId})+1,0,#{userId},0,SYSDATE,'F','F',0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE EMAIL = #{userId}
